title: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch II - Handou
title_english: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion II - Transgression
title_japanese: コードギアス 反逆のルルーシュⅡ 叛道
title_synonyms: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion - Rebellion
synopsis: Having achieved miraculous victories in a series of battles against the Britannian Army, Lelouch Lamperouge has brought the Black Knights, his paramilitary organization, to a more powerful state than ever before. Nothing seems impossible for him when he utilizes his military strength, intellect, and Geass power of absolute obedience. However, obstacles in the face of the uprising never cease, putting Lelouch in a difficult predicament. Most worryingly, Suzaku Kururugi's combat prowess and the appearance of a mysterious child named V.V. threaten to put an end to Lelouch's great rebellion. [Written by MAL Rewrite]

Alternative version.name: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch R2

Prequel.name: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch I - Koudou

Sequel.name: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch III - Oudou

opening_themes: "Yuukyou Seishunka (勇侠青春謳)" by ALI PROJECT
ending_themes: "The Moon" by Sakura Fujiwara (藤原さくら)
